backend/main.mo: Actor providing user-authenticated task CRUD, streak tracking, and user profile storage using Map and List structures.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-generated summaries of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider, and applies AuthGate to protected pages.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsSummary: Renders four metric cards showing daily, weekly, monthly, and all-time task completion stats.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top navigation bar showing logo, user profile info, and logout action when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout with header, conditional nav, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Renders a top navigation bar with buttons that navigate to key app routes and highlight the active path.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Guards routes by checking authentication and profile status, redirecting to login or showing setup modals as needed.
frontend/src/components/ExportDataCard.t: Provides a UI to select a date range, fetch tasks from the backend, and export them as a CSV file.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalQuot: Displays a motivational quote with an option to refresh it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for creating a user profile with name and primary goal selection.
frontend/src/components/StreakWidget.tsx: Shows the user’s current and best streaks along with the streak rule, with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/TaskForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing a task with fields for title, date, status, category, and notes.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Displays a list of tasks with options to toggle status, edit, or delete, and shows an empty-state UI if none exist.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Contains a static list of motivational quotes with optional authors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Computes daily, weekly, monthly, and all-time task completion stats by querying tasks for various date ranges. Returns analytics data via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and authentication status via AuthClient.
Returns a random motivational quote and a method to refresh it. Stores the current quote index in state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for loading and mutating user profiles and tasks, invalidating cache on changes. Supports creating, editing, deleting, toggling tasks, and fetching tasks by date.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreak.ts: Computes current and best task-completion streaks by checking completed tasks over the last 90 days. Provides streak data through a React Query hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables with warm, earthy color palettes. Applies global base, component, and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChartsPage.tsx: Displays analytics summary cards and progress bars using data from useAnalytics. Shows skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/pages/DailyProgressPage.tsx: Shows daily task completion rate, completed and pending task lists, and allows selecting a date to load tasks. Uses useGetTasksByDate and analytics helpers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with date selection, task list, completion progress, streak widget, and motivational quote, using tasks fetched for the selected date.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity login flow with error handling and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows users to view and update profile settings, goal type, and appearance preferences, with data loaded and saved via profile queries.
frontend/src/pages/SplashPage.tsx: Displays the landing page with feature highlights and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/TaskEditorPage.tsx: Handles creating and editing tasks using a shared form, determining mode from URL params and saving via task mutations.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Computes the percent of tasks completed for a given day.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Exports tasks to a CSV file with proper escaping and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/utils/dateRanges.ts: Provides utilities for generating date ranges including full ranges, week ranges, and month ranges.
frontend/src/utils/streaks.ts: Calculates current and best streaks from a map of dates to completion flags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and animations, plus typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including metadata, features, architecture notes, and image requirements for a daily progress tracking app.
